member.name: M:Scheduledo.Api.Controllers.WeekPlanController.GetWeekPlans
member.summary: Used to get all week plans of a coach. If requester is a coach, endpoint will return all week plans of this coach, if requester is a client endpoint will return all week plans of his coach instead.

member.name: M:Scheduledo.Api.Controllers.WeekPlanController.CreateWeekPlan(Scheduledo.Service.Models.WeekPlanInput)
member.summary: Used to create a new week plan with related day plans and workout times.

member.name: M:Scheduledo.Api.Controllers.WeekPlanController.EditWeekPlan(Scheduledo.Model.Entities.WeekPlan)
member.summary: Used to modify and existing week plan for a requesting coach (sending a week plan with an empty day plan collection removes related day plans; sending a week plan with a day plan colletion containing objects that do not exist in the database will create those objects; sending a week plan with a day plan colletion not containing objects that exist in the database will remove those objects

member.name: M:Scheduledo.Api.Controllers.WeekPlanController.DeleteWeekPlan(Scheduledo.Model.Entities.WeekPlan)
member.summary: Used to delete an existing week plan with related day plans and workout times
